title: Missing Skins
body:
I doubt I'm alone. I am missing skins that i paid for legitimately. I noticed it when i couldn't play Snow Day Singed :(

I tried and tried again to select and it wont let me . very disappointing.

replies.body: Hmmmm it doesn't look like this account has any record of ever owning Snow Day Singed. If you were talking about a different account, feel free to let me know which account and I can look into that for ya!
I just dont understand because I remember buying snow day singed for me and a skin for my freind snow day bard... then we had a snow day......
I guess ill check my other accounts.....
